message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Let's compromise. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I also need to get a fair share.
I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers
Okay, let's try one more time. This is a reasonable offer, and we need to come to an agreement soon before the value of the money drops even further.
